# bds-navbar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                       | Type                                                       | Default       |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `background`     | `background`      | Width, number to define navbar width.                                             | `"surface-1" \| "surface-2" \| "surface-3" \| "surface-4"` | `'surface-1'` |
| `navbarPosition` | `navbar-position` | navbar position. Used to position the navbar. Either on the left or on the right. | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`                               | `'vertical'`  |


## Events

| Event       | Description                          | Type               |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------ | ------------------ |
| `bdsToggle` | Emitted when the isOpen has changed. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
